title.narrative: COMMUNICATION, ADVOCACY AND PARTNERSHIPS

description.narrative: UNICEF partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on child rights issues with stakeholders, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: UNICEF Angola implements equity focused, evidence and rights-based, results oriented country programme in line with national, regional and global strategies and priorities, and in development and emergency contexts.

participating-org.narrative: MINISTERIO DA JUSTICA E DOS DIREITO HUMANOS

mailing-address.narrative: P.O. Box 2707 Luanda Republic of Angola

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF partners are provided tools, guidance and resources for effective communication on child rights issues with stakeholders

description.narrative: Three (3) new private sector partner engagements were initiated with focused private sector fundraising resulting in a local US$ 1.2 million contribution to secure resilience building and integrated service delivery for children in Cunene and strong media relation and high-quality advocacy material is positively influencing the public discussion on the impact of integrated service delivery and social cash transfer, now recognized in the state budget 2020. | Status:Met | As-of Date:16/01/2020

actual.value: 2019:ACO is implementing Communication and advocacy strategies for Social protection (Cash Transfers, Integrated Service Delivery, Child Firendly Budgeting), Child Protection (Birth Registration and Juvenile Justice) and implements Cause Frameworks Campaigns a
